item.title: The Past and Future of the Kaffir Races
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book The Past and Future of the Kaffir Races. In three parts. 1. Their history. II. Their Manners. III. The means needful for their preservation and improvement. by Rev. Holden, William C. Published for the author; and sold at 66, patternoster row: also by Richard Glanville, and co., South africa; and G. C. Cato, ESQ., Port Natal. 1866.]
